short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides posts from selected users on in-depthoutdoors forums

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows hiding the posts of selected users of the In-Depth Outdoors forums.  

To add a user to the list go to their profile page, select their Username, right-click on the selection, and choose 'Add to IDO block list'.  When selecting the username it does not matter if the leading @ symbol is selected or not.  Note that the display name is not necessarily the same as the username displayed on the profile page and blocking will only work based on username.

To remove a user from the list right click on the hook icon in the upper right area of the Chrome toolbar and select 'Options'.
